publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-391# Fiona Hyslop: Warm Deal—That the Parliament notes with concern the operation of the Warm Deal in Scotland with specific reference to the exclusion of central heating systems from grant eligibility and supports a review of the current operation of the Warm Deal to address this and other concerns. Supported by: Robin Harper*, Alex Neil*, Donald Gorrie*, Mr John McAllion*, Bill Aitken*, Richard Lochhead*, Linda Fabiani*

S1M-391# Fiona Hyslop: Warm Deal—That the Parliament notes with concern the operation of the Warm Deal in Scotland with specific reference to the exclusion of central heating systems from grant eligibility and supports a review of the current operation of the Warm Deal to address this and other concerns. Supported by: Robin Harper, Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie, Mr John McAllion, Bill Aitken, Richard Lochhead, Linda Fabiani
